alert.note: Alert for Duval (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Corpus Christi (Corpus Cristi, Victoria and Laredo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 04 at 4:38PM CDT by NWS Corpus Christi
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Duval County through 515 PM CDT... At 438 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Concepcion, or 9 miles south of Benavides, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Concepcion, Ramirez, Rios and Cruz Calle. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
